name: Dirtbike Survival . Block Motorcycles Racing Game
name_original: Dirtbike Survival . Block Motorcycles Racing Game
description:
Show your adventurous spirit that is within you and try to survive on these precious pixel motorcycles!

Agility, precision, extreme driving, adventure and boundless motorcycling come together in Dirtbike Survival so that the players enjoy driving!

Choose your bike and take full advantage of it as you grow as a player!

Designed Dirtbikes
All the Dirt Bike motorcycles of this game have a blocky and pixel design that you will like and that all the players will enjoy! Ideal for fans of this type of cube games!

Race with all the motorcyles and discover which one suits best to you! Learn to control the top speed!

Comfortable and simple controls
Move to any side in a simple way and without the feared complications like in other games that complicates your experience!

The goal is to get the maximum points possible while dodging other bikes that try to hinder your way! Do not let them end your race and get rid of your enemies!

Be the fastest so that no one prevents you from victory!

Convince your friends to download the game and compete to see who is the best surviving on the leaderboard!

Features of this Dirtbike game:

◉ Survival mode without limits!
◉ Pixelated MX Dirt Bike Motorcycles!
◉ Intuitive controls!
◉ High speed!
◉ Precious Blocky Graphics!
◉ Leaderboards!
◉ Entertaining music!
◉ Free!

Download this amazing motocross racing game now and win your rivals in the best survival race of the app store!

We invite you to evaluate our game so that we can know what you think about it and so that we can interact and learn what improvements cross your mind.

We assure you a long time of entertainment!

Heat your wheels, stay focused and ride at full speed!

This is not an official Mojang app. Fernando Baro is not associated or connected with Mojang AB.
Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang AB and it is not endorsed by or affiliated with the creator of this game or its licensors.
